resources.string: Tap volume up to compose, tap volume down to read
Use volume up to tap out Morse Code. Tap volume up for dot, hold volume up for dash. Use Volume Down to start navigating the list. Tap both Volume Up and Down at the same time to select.
Tap volume up for dot, hold volume up for dash, press volume down to send
Tap volume up to listen, tap volume down to reply
type a contact or a phone number
Use Volume Up to go up. Use Volume Down to go down. Tap both Volume Up and Down at same time to select.
Use volume up and volume down keys to go through messages. Press volume up and volume together to reply to conversation.

This message will only play once. Thank you for installing Blindly Messenger. To turn on text to speech after this message, use the touch screen to press Menu and Preferences. After you are set up, you can use the application without using the touchscreen. On any screen, long hold and release volume up and down for help on that screen. Enjoy!
